title: Alien Bride for Christmas
description: Joy to the out-of-this-World!A sci-fi romance writer who doesn’t know the first thing about aliens or sex.Esla James is the best when it comes to steamy alien romances. She specializes in big blue aliens owning and ravishing their female mates. But Esla doesn’t write from experience. Outside the pages, she’s single, curvy, and self-conscious. Her famously descriptive wild sexcapades are imaginative retellings of her party girl roommate’s late night tales.Now Esla’s been abducted by real aliens, and her kidnappers believe she’s the perfect match for a client who’s looking for an alien expert. Esla must prove she’s the real deal after encountering the only kind alien she’s met so far, but how can she play the role of interspecies sex goddess when her real-life self is a clueless virgin?If you love steamy science fiction romance, and the holiday season, you will love Alien Bride for Christmas. Come for the hot alien action and stay for the guaranteed HEA!Start reading with just one click!
author: Sabrina Kade
